00031 inline bool isSameMorphemeList( const MorphemeList* list1, const MorphemeList* list2, bool printPOS )
00032 {
00033         // if one is zero pointer, return null
00034         if( !list1 || !list2 )
00035         {
00036                 return false;
00037         }
00038 
00039         if( list1->size() != list2->size() )
00040                 return false;
00041         //compare one by one
00042         size_t N = list1->size();
00043         if( printPOS )
00044         {
00045                 for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00046                 {
00047                         const Morpheme& m1 = (*list1)[i];
00048                         const Morpheme& m2 = (*list2)[i];
00049                         if( m1.lexicon_ != m2.lexicon_ || m1.posCode_ != m2.posCode_
00050                                         || m1.posStr_ != m2.posStr_ )
00051                         {
00052                                 return false;
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055         }
00056         else
00057         {
00058                 for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00059                 {
00060                         if( (*list1)[i].lexicon_ != (*list2)[i].lexicon_ )
00061                                 return false;
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         //all the elements are the same
00065         return true;
00066 }

00085 bool JMA_Analyzer::isPOSFormatAlphabet() const
00086 {
00087     return (getOption(OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET) != 0);

00090 void JMA_Analyzer::setKnowledge(Knowledge* pKnowledge)
00091 {
00092     assert(pKnowledge);
00093 
00094     // release the resources before allocating new ones
00095     clear();
00096 
00097     knowledge_ = dynamic_cast<JMA_Knowledge*>(pKnowledge);
00098     assert(knowledge_);
00099 
00100     tagger_ = knowledge_->createTagger();
00101     // if runWith*() would be called, tagger_ should not be NULL,
00102     // if only splitSentence() would be called, tagger_ could be NULL as no dictionary needs to be loaded.
00103     if(tagger_)
00104     {
00105         tagger_->set_lattice_level(1);
00106     }
00107 
00108     maxPosCateOffset_ = knowledge_->getPOSCatNum() - 1;
00109     preBaseFormOffset_ = knowledge_->getBaseFormOffset();
00110 
00111     posTable_ = knowledge_->getPOSTable();
00112 }
00113 
00114 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithSentence(Sentence& sentence)
00115 {
00116     if(tagger_ == 0)
00117     {
00118         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00119         return 0;
00120     }
00121 
00122         bool printPOS = getOption(OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING) > 0;
00123         int N = (int)getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST);
00124     bool isPOSAlphabet = isPOSFormatAlphabet();
00125 
00126         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(sentence.getString(), ' ');
00127         const char* strPtr =  retStr.data();
00128 
00129         //one best
00130         if(N <= 1)
00131         {
00132                 const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00133                 MorphemeList list;
00134                 for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next)
00135                 {
00136                         string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00137                         if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00138                                 continue;
00139                         list.push_back(Morpheme());
00140                         Morpheme& morp = list.back();
00141                         morp.lexicon_ = seg;
00142                         setBaseForm(seg, node->feature, morp.baseForm_);
00143                         if(printPOS)
00144                         {
00145                                 morp.posCode_ = (int)node->posid;
00146                                 morp.posStr_ = isPOSAlphabet ? posTable_->getAlphabetPOS(morp.posCode_) : string(node->feature, getPOSOffset(node->feature));
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149                 sentence.addList(list, 1.0);
00150         }
00151         // N-best
00152         else
00153         {
00154                 double totalScore = 0;
00155 
00156                 if( !tagger_->parseNBestInit( strPtr ) )
00157                 {
00158                         cerr << "[Error] Cannot parseNBestInit on the " << strPtr << endl;
00159                         return 0;
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 long base = 0;
00163                 int i = 0;
00164                 for ( ; i < N;  )
00165                 {
00166                         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->nextNode();
00167                         if( !bosNode )
00168                                 break;
00169                         MorphemeList list;
00170                         for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next)
00171                         {
00172                                 string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00173                                 if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00174                                         continue;
00175                                 list.push_back(Morpheme());
00176                                 Morpheme& morp = list.back();
00177                                 morp.lexicon_ = seg;
00178                                 setBaseForm(seg, node->feature, morp.baseForm_);
00179                                 if(printPOS)
00180                                 {
00181                                         morp.posCode_ = (int)node->posid;
00182                     morp.posStr_ = isPOSAlphabet ? posTable_->getAlphabetPOS(morp.posCode_) : string(node->feature, getPOSOffset(node->feature));
00183                                 }
00184                         }
00185 
00186                         bool isDupl = false;
00187                         //check the current result with exits results
00188                         for( int listOffset = sentence.getListSize() - 1 ; listOffset >= 0; --listOffset )
00189                         {
00190                                 if( isSameMorphemeList( sentence.getMorphemeList(listOffset), &list, printPOS ) )
00191                                 {
00192                                         isDupl = true;
00193                                         break;
00194                                 }
00195                         }
00196                         //ignore the duplicate results
00197                         if( isDupl )
00198                                 continue;
00199 
00200                         long score = tagger_->nextScore();
00201                         if( i == 0 )
00202                         {
00203                                 if(score > 0 )
00204                                         base = score > BASE_NBEST_SCORE ? score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE : 0;
00205                                 else
00206                                         base = score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE;
00207                         }
00208 
00209                         double dScore = 1.0 / (score - base );
00210                         totalScore += dScore;
00211                         sentence.addList( list, dScore );
00212 
00213                         ++i;
00214                 }
00215 
00216                 for ( int j = 0; j < i; ++j )
00217                 {
00218                         sentence.setScore(j, sentence.getScore(j) / totalScore );
00219                 }
00220         }
00221 
00222         return 1;
00223 }
00224 
00225 const char* JMA_Analyzer::runWithString(const char* inStr)
00226 {
00227     if(tagger_ == 0)
00228     {
00229         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00230         return 0;
00231     }
00232 
00233         bool printPOS = getOption(OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING) > 0;
00234     bool isPOSAlphabet = isPOSFormatAlphabet();
00235 
00236         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(inStr, ' ');
00237         const char* strPtr =  retStr.data();
00238 
00239         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00240 
00241         strBuf_.clear();
00242         if (printPOS) {
00243                 for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next){
00244                         string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00245                         if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00246                                 continue;
00247 
00248                         strBuf_.append(node->surface, node->length).append(posDelimiter_);
00249             if(isPOSAlphabet)
00250             {
00251                 strBuf_.append(posTable_->getAlphabetPOS(static_cast<int>(node->posid)));
00252             }
00253             else
00254             {
00255                 strBuf_.append(node->feature, getPOSOffset(node->feature));
00256             }
00257                         strBuf_.append(wordDelimiter_);
00258                 }
00259 
00260         } else {
00261                 for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next){
00262                         string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00263                         if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00264                                 continue;
00265 
00266                         strBuf_.append(node->surface, node->length).append(wordDelimiter_);
00267                 }
00268         }
00269 
00270         return strBuf_.c_str();
00271 }

00273 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithStream(const char* inFileName, const char* outFileName)
00274 {
00275         assert(inFileName);
00276         assert(outFileName);
00277 
00278     if(tagger_ == 0)
00279     {
00280         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00281         return 0;
00282     }
00283 
00284         bool printPOS = getOption(OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING) > 0;
00285     bool isPOSAlphabet = isPOSFormatAlphabet();
00286 
00287         ifstream in(inFileName);
00288         if(!in)
00289         {
00290                 cerr<<"[Error] The input file "<<inFileName<<" not exists!"<<endl;
00291                 return 0;
00292         }
00293 
00294     ofstream out(outFileName);
00295         if(!out)
00296         {
00297                 cerr<<"[Error] The output file "<<outFileName<<" could not be created!"<<endl;
00298                 return 0;
00299         }
00300 
00301     string line;
00302     bool remains = !in.eof();
00303     while (remains) {
00304         getline(in, line);
00305         remains = !in.eof();
00306         if (!line.length()) {
00307             if( remains )
00308                                 out << endl;
00309             continue;
00310         }
00311 
00312         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(line.c_str(), ' ');
00313         const char* strPtr =  retStr.data();
00314 
00315         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00316 
00317         if (printPOS) {
00318                         for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next){
00319                                 string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00320                                 if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00321                                         continue;
00322 
00323                                 out.write(node->surface, node->length) << posDelimiter_;
00324                 if(isPOSAlphabet)
00325                 {
00326                     out << posTable_->getAlphabetPOS(static_cast<int>(node->posid));
00327                 }
00328                 else
00329                 {
00330                     out.write(node->feature, getPOSOffset(node->feature));
00331                 }
00332                                 out << wordDelimiter_;
00333                         }
00334 
00335             if (remains)
00336                 out << endl;
00337             else
00338                 break;
00339 
00340         } else {
00341                         for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node = node->next){
00342                                 string seg(node->surface, node->length);
00343                                 if(knowledge_->isStopWord(seg))
00344                                         continue;
00345 
00346                                 out.write(node->surface, node->length) << wordDelimiter_;
00347                         }
00348 
00349                         if (remains)
00350                                 out << endl;
00351                         else
00352                                 break;
00353         }
00354     }
00355 
00356     in.close();
00357     out.close();
00358     return 1;
00359 }
00360 
00361 void JMA_Analyzer::splitSentence(const char* paragraph, std::vector<Sentence>& sentences)
00362 {
00363     if(! paragraph)
00364         return;
00365 
00366     Sentence result;
00367     string sentenceStr;
00368     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer( knowledge_->getCType() );
00369     tokenizer.assign(paragraph);
00370     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00371     {
00372         if( knowledge_->isSentenceSeparator(p) )
00373         {
00374             sentenceStr += p;
00375 
00376             result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00377             sentences.push_back(result);
00378 
00379             sentenceStr.clear();
00380         }
00381         /*// white-space characters are also used as sentence separator,
00382         // but they are ignored in the sentence result
00383         else if(ctype_->isSpace(p))
00384         {
00385             if(! sentenceStr.empty())
00386             {
00387                 result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00388                 sentences.push_back(result);
00389 
00390                 sentenceStr.clear();
00391             }
00392         }*/
00393         else
00394         {
00395             sentenceStr += p;
00396         }
00397     }
00398 
00399     // in case the last character is not space or sentence separator
00400     if(! sentenceStr.empty())
00401     {
00402         result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00403         sentences.push_back(result);
00404 
00405         sentenceStr.clear();
00406     }
00407 }

00410 int JMA_Analyzer::getPOSOffset(const char* feature)
00411 {
00412         if( getOption(OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY) != 0 )
00413         {
00414                 // count for the index of the fourth offset
00415                 int offset = 0;
00416                 int commaCount = 0;
00417                 for( ; feature[offset]; ++offset )
00418                 {
00419                         if(feature[offset] == ',')
00420                         {
00421                                 ++commaCount;
00422                                 if( commaCount > maxPosCateOffset_ )
00423                                         break;
00424                         }
00425                 }
00426                 return offset;
00427         }
00428 
00429          //count for the index of the comma that after non-star pos sections
00430         int offset = 0;
00431         int commaCount = 0;
00432         for( ; feature[offset]; ++offset )
00433         {
00434                 if(feature[offset] == ',')
00435                 {
00436                         ++commaCount;
00437                         if( commaCount > maxPosCateOffset_ )
00438                                 break;
00439                 }
00440                 else if(feature[offset] == '*')
00441                 {
00442                         //if offset is 0, contains nothing
00443                         return offset ? offset - 1 : 0 ;
00444                 }
00445         }
00446 
00447         return offset;
00448 }
00449 
00450 void JMA_Analyzer::setBaseForm(const string& origForm, const char* feature, string& retVal)
00451 {
00452         int offset = 0;
00453         int commaCount = 0;
00454         int begin = -1;
00455         int end = -1;
00456         for( ; feature[offset]; ++offset )
00457         {
00458                 if(feature[offset] == ',')
00459                 {
00460                         ++commaCount;
00461                         if(commaCount == preBaseFormOffset_)
00462                                 begin = offset + 1;
00463                         else if(commaCount == preBaseFormOffset_ + 1)
00464                         {
00465                                 end = offset;
00466                                 break;
00467                         }
00468                 }
00469         }
00470 
00471         if(begin >= 0)
00472         {
00473                 if(end < 0)
00474                         end = offset;
00475                 retVal = string(feature + begin, end - begin);
00476         }
00477 
00478         if(!retVal.size() || retVal == "*")
00479                 retVal = origForm;
00480 }
